globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://login.microsoftonline.com https://*.ciamlogin.com https://*.grafana.net; frame-src 'self' https://login.microsoftonline.com https://*.ciamlogin.com; frame-ancestors 'none';
